lines.text: See that's all I want to do Billy-Boy. I want to leap of this pier and fly high in the air with hang with the wind and drift through the clouds, and at night, with the Moon full and the sea wild, I meet my lover high on a cliff and we'd swoop down into the ocean and swim all the way touch the bottom up through the dark water and break the surface. Then we'd fly to Jamaica for Pina Colatas... God, I wish I could do that.

[voiceover]
That was the last time I ever saw her.
He wears black socks with sandals and Bermuda shorts, smokes Parliaments and drives a Lark.
You had sex with my prom date.
It's like everything's normal, but I don't give a shit about any of it.
